## About Me

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

create_triangle <- function(row) {
  x <- c(0, 1, 0.5)
  y <- c(0, 0, sqrt(3)/2)
  
  df <- data.frame(x, y)
  gg <- ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
    geom_polygon(fill = "blue") +
    coord_fixed() +
    theme_void() +
    xlim(c(-0.1, 1.1)) +
    ylim(c(-0.1, 1.1))
  
  for(i in seq(1, row-1)) {
    x_offset <- i/2
    y_offset <- i * sqrt(3)/2
    
    df_upper <- data.frame(x + x_offset, y + y_offset)
    df_lower <- data.frame(x - x_offset, y + y_offset)
    
    gg <- gg + 
      geom_polygon(data = df_upper, aes(x, y), fill = "blue") +
      geom_polygon(data = df_lower, aes(x, y), fill = "blue")
  }
  
  return(gg)
}

create_triangle(10)
